marklogic.body: where is the president, where is eric holder? these are the questions we should be asking. if you can allow this Bounty of a million from the black panthers or this web site with a bulls eye. we can finally see this president and his ag do not care about anyone especially half whites or any white. i hope america remembers this. is this what a president should be doing or better yet a attorney general who seems to think that whites are the enemy. a gang of hoodies Burned a white man while videoing it laughing and saying slurs! haste crime? in florida of all places to british tourists were executed by a black man he had put them on there knees begging for there lives. hate crime? in both instances not peep from the justice department. even worse those boys mothers Â wrote 3 letters to the cummunity organiser, notÂ a word back. justice is not a word spoken in this administration only what can get me back in the seat. remember this in nov.
